channel.title: I need help with two things
channel.description: I need help adding drops, and adding safe spots.. any help?

item.title: I need help with two things
item.dc:creator: @Zaikill Zaikill
item.description:
@Zaikill wrote:

first open :

autospawn.cfg

Exemple we take ice queen, Add this to your autospawn.cfg

spawn = 795	2790	10222	0	0	0	0	0	1	icequeen

Now this npc can spawn in your server. lets add the drop now

Open your Item3.java
and add this code :

public static int icequeen[] = {526,526,526,526,526,526,526,526,1580,1580,1580,78,78,78,78,78,78};
	public static int randomicequeen()
	{
		return icequeen[(int)(Math.random()*icequeen.length)];
	}

this is the item icequeen will drop if u kill it

526,526,526,526,526,526,526,526,1580,1580,1580,78,78,78,78,78,78

Now icequeen can drop icegloves, ice arrows , bones …

do it for any npc you want add in your server

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with two things

item.title: I need help with two things
item.dc:creator: @sexytimee sexytimee
item.description:
@sexytimee wrote:

lol?

To add npc drops you go to your CFG or Config folder. Look for npcdrops.cfg and edit that.

Read full topic
